markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 40 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 [Sister Of The Bloodshot Eye](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2318) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 323 **Perception** +23 **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37) **Skills** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +22, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +25, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +20, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +23 **Str** +2 **Dex** +2 **Con** +4 **Int** +1 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +2 **Items** _+1 [wounding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=309) [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_, _+1 [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_, [religious symbol of Gyronna](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) --- **AC** 31 **Fort** +22 **Ref** +20 **Will** +25 **HP** 250 --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _dagger_ +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 2d4+6 piercing plus 1d6 bleed **Divine Spells Prepared** DC 36, attack +26 - **Cantrips (6th)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **1st** [Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) - **2nd** [Ghoulish Cravings](/Spells.aspx?ID=134), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) - **3rd** [Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Chilling Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=36), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) - **4th** [Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Globe of Invulnerability](/Spells.aspx?ID=137) - **5th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Shadow Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=273) - **6th** [Blade Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=24), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×3), [Repulsion](/Spells.aspx?ID=254), [Summon Fiend](/Spells.aspx?ID=323) **Divine Font** harm **Infectious Wrath** ([Aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The Sister projects her wrath and rage into the minds of any number of creatures of her choice within 30 feet. Targeted creatures must attempt a DC 32 Will save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) for 1 round as they become distracted by the unexpected fit of rage.
**Failure** The creature is [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) for 1 round.
**Critical Failure** The creature is confused for as long as they remain within 30 feet of the Sister, or until they succeed at the DC 11 flat check to recover.
name: Sister Of The Bloodshot Eye

text: Sister Of The Bloodshot Eye Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 40 Unspecific Lore : DC 38 Specific Lore : DC 35 Sister Of The Bloodshot Eye Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 323 Perception +23 Languages Abyssal, Common, Hallit Skills Deception +22, Intimidation +22, Religion +25, Society +20, Survival +23 Str +2 Dex +2 Con +4 Int +1 Wis +5 Cha +2 Items +1 wounding striking dagger , +1 breastplate , religious symbol of Gyronna --- AC 31 Fort +22 Ref +20 Will +25 HP 250 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action dagger +24 (Agile, Finesse, versatile S), Damage 2d4+6 piercing plus 1d6 bleed Divine Spells Prepared DC 36, attack +26 - Cantrips (6th) Daze, Detect Magic, Divine Lance, Message, Shield - 1st Bane, Command, Ray of Enfeeblement - 2nd Ghoulish Cravings, Resist Energy, Silence - 3rd Blindness, Chilling Darkness, Vampiric Touch - 4th Divine Wrath, Freedom of Movement, Globe of Invulnerability - 5th Dispel Magic, Heal, Shadow Blast - 6th Blade Barrier, Harm (×3), Repulsion, Summon Fiend Divine Font harm Infectious Wrath Single Action (Aura, Divine, Emotion, Enchantment, Mental) Frequency once per day; Effect The Sister projects her wrath and rage into the minds of any number of creatures of her choice within 30 feet. Targeted creatures must attempt a DC 32 Will save. Critical Success The creature is unaffected. Success The creature is flat-footed for 1 round as they become distracted by the unexpected fit of rage. Failure The creature is confused for 1 round. Critical Failure The creature is confused for as long as they remain within 30 feet of the Sister, or until they succeed at the DC 11 flat check to recover.
